scripts.browserify: NODE_ENV='production' browserify index.js --ignore-missing -t babelify --outfile www/dist/bundle.js -p [ parcelify -o www/dist/bundle.css  ]
scripts.discify: browserify index.js --full-paths --ignore-missing -t babelify --outfile discify/bundle.js && discify discify/bundle.js --output discify/disc.html
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.watch: watchify index.js --ignore-missing --debug --verbose -t babelify --outfile www/dist/bundle.js  -p [ parcelify -o www/dist/bundle.css  ]
